detailedRequirements:
Project Overview

The goal of this project is to build a mobile tool for community members to be more effective and more engaged in the Topcoder platform. Upon installing this mobile app, the user should be presented with the list of open challenges. The user can also Login/sign-up but that's not a required step to see the open challenges. Once a user attempts to register with a challenge, they will be forced into the sign-up/login flow. Optionally, the user can go to the navigation element and sign-up/login.

All submitters passing review on this developer challenge will also earn the Swift/iOS Ready Show Your Skills badge at the completion of the challenge. Ordinarily, this badge can only be earned by passing one of the peer-reviewed Show Your Skills challenges. During Swiftoberfest, certain challenges have been identified as [Swift/iOS Ready] which let you earn your badge while competing in real-world challenges, too!

Competition Task Overview

We have built a prorotoype app for this project, the purpose of this challenge is to wire some of the screens with the topcoder api to make them really functional.

Here are some general guidelines to follow:

  • ���You must use the provided code as base and add calls to the topcoder api to make these screens work
  • The updated code must support same devices and iOS versions as the provided prototype
  • Changes to UI are not allowed unless explicitly approved or listed below

Detailed Requirements

  • Please add a menu to the menu list. When the user is not logged in the menu should say "Login" and when clicked will open the login screen. When user is logged in the menu will say "Logout" and when clicked it will log the user out and re-direct to the welcome screen
  • The screen(s) to show open / past challenges should be working, you will be using the following apis:
    • ���https://api.topcoder.com/v2/develop/challenges/
    • https://api.topcoder.com/v2/design/challenges/
    • https://api.topcoder.com/v2/data/marathon/challenges/
  • The filter feature must work properly in the app
  • Searching of challenges must be working
  • The screen(s) to show challenge details should be working for all challenges. Here's a sample call: http://api.topcoder.com/v2/challenges/30051483/
  • The screen(s) to show challenge results should be working for all challenges. Here's a sample call: http://api.topcoder.com/v2/develop/challenges/result/30051557

Technology Overview

  • iOS 8+
  • iPhone 5+
  • Swift
  • Xcode
  • REST

Documentation Provided

Register to see documents in the forum.
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
Submission Deliverables

Below is an overview of the deliverables:

  • Xcode project that covers all mentioned requirements
  • A complete and detailed deployment documented explaining how to deploy the application including configuration information.
  • Video is NOT required for this challenge.

Final Submission

For each member, the final submission should be uploaded via the challenge detail page on topcoder.com.
